content: I've got an XML example that has comments. When it gets published, the comments have all moved to the 'top' of the containing element. I want the comments to stay exactly where I put them. Why are they moving? Is this a result of the fact we now have JSON comments? Can we fix this? (@Grahame Grieve )
make an example in the sample-ig and I'll look at it. It's certainly not supposed to happen
